thumb.title: [TAS] NES グーニーズ2 "スーパージャンプ無し" by McBobX in 14:33.36
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OLaK0XEydmY以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6538M TAS originally published on 2025-05-09The Goonies II is a sequel to The Goonies, despite the fact that there is no sequel movie. In it, you control Mikey, who must rescue all of his friends from the Fratellis.This time, McBobX ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/McBobX) completes the game whilst not performing any super jumps (which notably allow for wrong warps) in record time.
thumb.last_res_body: 実況者のマンタロ... あけましておめで... この音も何度聴い... 乙 ひええ み、みえ スーパージャンプ... スーパージャンプ... ブーメラン盗み 今のタイミングで... 国２ そろそろ詭弁やろ... とーち...

tags.tag: またおm・・・誰だお前は！？
